duties_responsibilities.duty: Support veterinarians to ensure quality veterinary care, advocate for pets, and educate clients.
Assist with surgeries, monitor anesthetic procedures, wellness appointments, restraint, and client education.
Communicate with clients about pet health concerns and offer guidance on membership options, medications, and additional treatments.
Maintain comprehensive medical records and obtain relevant health history and information from clients.
Follow standard protocols and sustain clean, sterile, organized treatment areas, exam rooms, and labs.
Guide, mentor, and support fellow team members.

education_certification.credential: Previous veterinary experience is required. NYS License is required. Ability to lift up to 50 pounds, squatting, reach, standing, and walking throughout the day.
